SEARCH
Module PSP24
Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.rmi

Class ServerRMI

java.lang.Object
java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
it.polimi.ingsw.network.rmi.ServerRMI
All Implemented Interfaces:
GameControllerInterface, Serializable, Remote
public class ServerRMI extends UnicastRemoteObject implements GameControllerInterface
RMIServer Class Handle all the incoming network requests that clients can require to join or leave a game by the RMI Network protocol
See Also:
